attributes.action: Ban Gas Patio Heaters and Save more than 80% Energy
attributes.additional_details: Many City Councils in Europe are banning the use of Dangerous and Uneconomical Gas Patio Heaters in Public Places such as Hotels, Restaurants & Cafes. The UK DOE & HSE should go one step further by introducing new legislation governing the use of these Gas Heaters which will illiminate them and allow replacing them with more enviromentally friendly Infrared Heaters that have >80% lower C02 emmissions. This will appease the environmentalists and HORECA owners alike. Similar Campaign to replacing Tungsten Lightbulbs with LED Lamps
